name: Viper Peak
location: Toril, Davao City, Davao del Sur
description: Viper Peak in Toril, Davao City is one of the most popular hiking destinations in the city. Because of its proximity to the Poblaci√≥n and uncomplicated trails, a lot of health enthusiasts from Davao come to this place for recreation and exercise. This is not only open to runners, but bikers also flock the area for its uphill and downhill features too.

name: Epol Falls
location: Marilog District, Davao City, Davao del Sur
description: Epol is an acronym which stands for Everlasting Power of Love Waterfalls. It was formerly known as the Green Valley waterfalls. It is one of the natural tourist attractions of the mountainous area of Marilog District Davao City which is approximately three hundred (300) meters away from the highway. The falls are cascades of cold water that plunges into a natural pool. It is surrounded by tropical plants and trees that provide a habitat for wildlife.

name: Mt. Sinaka Cabins
description: Mt Sinaka is in the north-east of North Cotabato Province. There is forest remaining on the mountain between 1,100 and 1,448 m, including mossy forest above c.1,200 m, but the lower altitude forests are secondary or very badly degraded. This area was logged in the past, and the remaining forest is now surrounded with wide tracts of open grassland and agricultural land.
